original_text: And they captured the two princes of Midian, Oreb and Zeeb. They killed Oreb at the rock of Oreb, and Zeeb they killed at the winepress of Zeeb. Then they pursued Midian, and they brought the heads of Oreb and Zeeb to Gideon across the Jordan.
korean_text: 또 미디안의 두 방백 오렙과 스엡을 사로잡아 오렙은 오렙 바위에서 죽이고 스엡은 스엡 포도주 틀에서 죽이고 미디안을 추격하였고 오렙과 스엡의 머리를 요단 강 건너편에서 기드온에게 가져왔더라

sentences.original_text: And they captured the two princes of Midian
They killed Oreb at the rock of Oreb
and Zeeb they killed at the winepress of Zeeb
and they brought the heads of Oreb and Zeeb
